Package org.ietf.nea.pt.validate.rules

IETF transport message validation rules.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommonLengthLimits
    Rule, that checks if a given length value is within common limits.
    ConfiguredLengthLimit
    Rule, that checks if a given length does not exceed a configured maximum length.
    IdentifierLimits
    Rule, that checks if message identifier is in range.
    MessageVersion
    Rule, that checks if the given message version is supported.
    MinMessageLength
    Rule, that checks if the given length satisfies the minimum message length requirement.
    SaslMechanismName
    Rule, that checks if SASL mechanism name meets the RFC 4422 conventions.
    SaslResult
    Rule, that checks if SASL authentication result ID is known.
    TypeReservedAndLimits
    Rule, that checks if the message type ID is reserved or not in range.
    VendorIdReservedAndLimits
    Rule, that checks if the message vendor ID is reserved or not in range.
    VersionLimits
    Rule, that checks if message version is in range.

Package org.ietf.nea.pt.validate.rules Description

IETF transport message validation rules.
